details: Scrofulous affections, glandular enlargements, and tumors call for this remedy. Crops of boils. Acute nephritis following eruptive diseases. Uterine displacements. Body emaciated. Anemia. Exophthalmic goitre following suppression of menses. Debility following drain upon vital forces. Impetigo of the cheek.

Respiratory: Coryza; discharge of mucus from nose, trachea, and larynx
CRAWLING SENSATION IN URETHRA AND RECTUM
Sensation as if urine were stopped at fossa navicularis
Stomach: Food seems to push up into throat, as if it had not been swallowed
Abdomen: Fullness, even after a little food; stuffed feeling, as if she could not lean forward
Female: On sitting, FEELING AS IF SOMETHING PRESSED UPWARD IN VAGINA
Itching and soreness of vulva and vagina
Throat: Sore, as if of a splinter, shooting in different directions

name: Ferrum iodatum
dosage: Third trituration. Does not keep long.
